message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $12000. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think the price is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $12000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. What do you think?
I understand your compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13500. Can you consider this offer?
I see you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob! I appreciate that. However, I'm still a bit above $13500. I'm willing to take another step towards you and offer $13750. Can we meet in the middle again?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $13500. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $13300. This is as low as I can go, but I'm willing to make it work. Can we finalize the deal?
